DellUpdateService.description: This is the schema definition for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF Update Service Schema.
DellUpdateService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an OEM Update Service for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Install.description: This action is used to install firmware inventory instances
Install.longDescription: This action shall perform install of firmware inventory instances

InstallUpon.description: The type of Install Upon option, default value is NextReboot if not provided by user
InstallUpon.longDescription: The type of Install Upon option, default value is NextReboot if not provided by user

SoftwareIdentityURIs.description: Contains the relative URIs of the firmware inventory components to be installed, only one component installation at a time is allowed.
SoftwareIdentityURIs.longDescription: Contains the relative URIs of the firmware inventory components to be installed, only one component installation at a time is allowed.
